thread.title: Top-ranked Long Island, NYC hospitals by patients, according to U.S. Department of Health
thread.title_full: Top-ranked Long Island, NYC hospitals by patients, according to U.S. Department of Health | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Top-ranked Long Island, NYC hospitals by patients, according to U.S. Department of Health
text:
See how Nassau University Medical Center and other Long Island and New York City hospitals were ranked by patients. (Credit: Newsday / Alejandra Villa) 

Every year, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services compiles rankings from patients on their hospital experiences. Patients weigh in on their overall experience and whether they would recommend them to friends and family.
Of Long Island and New York City hospitals, St. Joseph Hospital raised its grade the most from 2015 to 2016 in both categories. Plainview Hospital had the most...
